result.html: Caithfidh muid brabús a bhaintWe have to make profit.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid brabús a ḃaintWe have to make profit.

result.eng: When do I need to make payment?

result.eng: What make is the washing machine?

result.eng: You yourself make history with your decisions, your opinions and your actions.
result.ga: Déanann tú féin an stair de bharr do chinntí do thuairimí agus do bhearta
result.orig: Déanann tú féin an stair de bharr do chinntí do thuairimí agus do bhearta

result.html: Ní dhéantar níos mó iadThey don't make any more.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḋéantar níos mó iadThey don't make any more.

result.eng: This is not the correct way to make pancakes!

result.eng: You have a choice to make.
result.html: Tá rogha le déanamh agatYou have a choice to make.
result.ponchtml: Tá roġa le déanaṁ agatYou have a choice to make.

result.eng: You will be able to take books home and make use of the computers.
result.ga: Beidh tú in ann leabhra a thabhairt abhaile agus úsáid a bhaint as na ríomhairí

result.eng: What time will we make the cake?

result.eng: I will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh

result.eng: She couldn't make sense of the day's events.
result.ga: Bhí ag dul di ciall a bhaint as imeachtaí an lae

result.eng: The pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ga: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann

result.eng: Hardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.

result.eng: I'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin

result.eng: Make sure to grab them by the throat and strangle them.

result.eng: Plates of gold that would make you blind.
